member.name: T:ChatBotTwitchLib.ChatBot
member.summary: Bot class. Conteins all bot methods for performing basic bot functions.
member.remarks: This class can connect/disconnect with chat and also handles occurring events.

member.name: M:ChatBotTwitchLib.ChatBot.Connect(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Void method responsible for connecting, throttling chat messages and defining event handler methods.
member.param: A bool parameter which define if bot should show the logs or not.

member.name: M:ChatBotTwitchLib.ChatBot.Client_OnUserTimedout(System.Object,TwitchLib.Client.Events.OnUserTimedoutArgs)
member.summary: Event handler which is activated when event of timeouting user occur.
member.remarks: When timeout occur bot will send simple message in chat.

member.name: M:ChatBotTwitchLib.ChatBot.Client_OnWhisperReceived(System.Object,TwitchLib.Client.Events.OnWhisperReceivedArgs)
member.summary: Event handler which is activated when event of receiving whisper by bot occur.
member.remarks: When whispered bot will send simple response.

member.name: M:ChatBotTwitchLib.ChatBot.Client_OnConnected(System.Object,TwitchLib.Client.Events.OnConnectedArgs)
member.summary: Event handler which is activated when event of connecting to the chat by bot occur.
member.remarks: When connected bot will type both in console and also in the chat message.

member.name: M:ChatBotTwitchLib.ChatBot.Client_OnChatCommandReceived(System.Object,TwitchLib.Client.Events.OnChatCommandReceivedArgs)
member.summary: Event handler which is activated when event of receiving command by bot occur.

member.name: M:ChatBotTwitchLib.ChatBot.Client_OnMessageReceived(System.Object,TwitchLib.Client.Events.OnMessageReceivedArgs)
member.summary: Event handler which is activated when event of seeing message in the chat occur.
member.remarks: When connected bot will type chat logs in the console.

member.name: M:ChatBotTwitchLib.ChatBot.Client_OnConnectionError(System.Object,TwitchLib.Client.Events.OnConnectionErrorArgs)
member.summary: Event handler which is activated when event of connection error occur.
member.remarks: Bot will type all connection errors in the console

member.name: M:ChatBotTwitchLib.ChatBot.Client_OnLog(System.Object,TwitchLib.Client.Events.OnLogArgs)
member.summary: Event handler which is activated when event of receiving logs occur.
member.remarks: Bot will type all logs in the console

member.name: M:ChatBotTwitchLib.ChatBot.Disconnect
member.summary: Void method responsible for disconnecting with chat.

member.name: T:ChatBotTwitchLib.TwitchBotInfo
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ChatBotTwitchLib.TwitchBotInfo.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ChatBotTwitchLib.TwitchBotInfo.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:ChatBotTwitchLib.TwitchBotInfo.BotToken
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 5rz0wi4csbgt03j8gs92kjkevxwi6t.

member.name: P:ChatBotTwitchLib.TwitchBotInfo.ChannelName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Wowizo23131.
